meta.hint: If you don't know the meaning of a word, look for context clues. They are nearby words that help you figure out the meaning of a new word. Example - Megan was glum when her best friend moved away. You can guess that 'glum' means 'sad'.
meta.question: Use nearby words or context to identify the  meaning of a word.

content.description: You cannot clap with one hand.
A bird can flap its wings.
The stone fell into the water with a plop.
Pull the plug and let the water drain away.
Let's flip a coin for a toss.
She was about to slip on the floor.
She slid a coin into the drawer.
